imdb.plot outline: Two children living in Rome take us on a journey of their favorite places and show us what life in Italy is really like. As well as visiting important sites in the cultural capital of Rome, we learn to make pizza, pick olives and make oil and enjoy a party in the company of Roman emperors.
imdb.title: Being Italian
plot: A documentary showing daily life in Italy.::Brown, Amanda

Two children living in Rome take us on a journey of their favorite places and show us what life in Italy is really like. As well as visiting important sites in the cultural capital of Rome, we learn to make pizza, pick olives and make oil and enjoy a party in the company of Roman emperors.::Brown, Amanda
